Positive: This design is quite wide. Due to the design feature, if an individual attempts to grab the hold there is a larger area to find a lip to grab. The wide hold also ensures a large inner cavity to store electronics
Minus: The design is wide but it is short in length, which compensates for the large amount of resin that would be used, although this design has a wide cavity it may not be an efficient use of space restricting the placement of technology.
Improvement: Improve inner cavity space whilst providing an easily graspable climbing hold.
